verses.verse: In the year<WH8141> that king<WH4428> Uzziah<WH5818> died<WH4194> I saw<WH7200> also<WH853> the Lord<WH136> sitting<WH3427> upon<WH5921> a throne,<WH3678> high<WH7311> and lifted up,<WH5375> and his train<WH7757> filled<WH4390> <WH853> the temple.<WH1964>

Above <WH4480> <WH4605> it stood<WH5975> the seraphims:<WH8314> each one<WH259> had six wings<WH8337> <WH3671> <WH8337> <WH3671> with twain<WH8147> he covered<WH3680> his face,<WH6440> and with twain<WH8147> he covered<WH3680> his feet,<WH7272> and with twain<WH8147> he did fly.<WH5774>

And one cried<WH7121> unto<WH413> <WH2088> another,<WH2088> and said,<WH559> Holy,<WH6918> holy,<WH6918> holy,<WH6918> is the LORD<WH3068> of hosts:<WH6635> the whole<WH3605> earth<WH776> is full<WH4393> of his glory.<WH3519>
And the posts<WH520> of the door<WH5592> moved<WH5128> at the voice<WH4480> <WH6963> of him that cried,<WH7121> and the house<WH1004> was filled<WH4390> with smoke.<WH6227>

Then said<WH559> I, Woe<WH188> is me! for<WH3588> I am undone;<WH1820> because<WH3588> I<WH589> am a man<WH376> of unclean<WH2931> lips,<WH8193> and I<WH589> dwell<WH3427> in the midst<WH8432> of a people<WH5971> of unclean<WH2931> lips:<WH8193> for<WH3588> mine eyes<WH5869> have seen<WH7200> <WH853> the King,<WH4428> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

Then flew<WH5774> one<WH259> of<WH4480> the seraphims<WH8314> unto<WH413> me, having a live coal<WH7531> in his hand,<WH3027> which he had taken<WH3947> with the tongs<WH4457> from off<WH4480> <WH5921> the altar: <WH4196>

And he laid<WH5060> it upon<WH5921> my mouth,<WH6310> and said,<WH559> Lo,<WH2009> this<WH2088> hath touched<WH5060> <WH5921> thy lips;<WH8193> and thine iniquity<WH5771> is taken away,<WH5493> and thy sin<WH2403> purged.<WH3722>

Also I heard<WH8085> <WH853> the voice<WH6963> of the Lord,<WH136> saying,<WH559> <WH853> Whom<WH4310> shall I send,<WH7971> and who<WH4310> will go<WH1980> for us? Then said<WH559> I, Here am I;<WH2009> send<WH7971> me.

And he said,<WH559> Go,<WH1980> and tell<WH559> this<WH2088> people,<WH5971> Hear ye indeed,<WH8085> <WH8085> but understand<WH995> not;<WH408> and see ye indeed,<WH7200> <WH7200> but perceive<WH3045> not.<WH3808>

Make the heart<WH3820> of this<WH2088> people<WH5971> fat,<WH8082> and make their ears<WH241> heavy,<WH3513> and shut<WH8173> their eyes;<WH5869> lest<WH6435> they see<WH7200> with their eyes,<WH5869> and hear<WH8085> with their ears,<WH241> and understand<WH995> with their heart,<WH3824> and convert,<WH7725> and be healed.<WH7495>

Then said<WH559> I, Lord,<WH136> how long?<WH5704> <WH4970> And he answered,<WH559> Until<WH5704> <WH834> the cities<WH5892> be wasted<WH7582> without<WH4480> <WH369> inhabitant,<WH3427> and the houses<WH1004> without<WH4480> <WH369> man,<WH120> and the land<WH127> be utterly<WH8077> desolate,<WH7582>
And the LORD<WH3068> have removed men far away,<WH7368> <WH853> <WH120> and there be a great<WH7227> forsaking<WH5805> in the midst<WH7130> of the land.<WH776>

But yet<WH5750> in it shall be a tenth,<WH6224> and it shall return,<WH7725> and shall be<WH1961> eaten:<WH1197> as a teil tree,<WH424> and as an oak,<WH437> whose<WH834> substance<WH4678> is in them, when they cast<WH7995> their leaves: so the holy<WH6944> seed<WH2233> shall be the substance<WH4678> thereof.
